mapper.update: update PERSON set FIRST_NAME = #{firstName}, LAST_NAME = #{lastName}, SEX = #{sex}, RELIGIOUS_DATE = #{religiousDate}, EMAIL = #{email} where ID = #{id};

drop table if exists PERSON; create table if not exists PERSON (ID int not null auto_increment, FIRST_NAME char(50), LAST_NAME char(50), SEX varchar default null, RELIGIOUS_DATE date, EMAIL char(50),
PRIMARY KEY (id));
